reviews.review_msg: Mark is very understanding and willing to accommodate for students. He requires the students to want to succeed, put in hard work and consistency.
His class will push your to expand your mind and thinking. Don't take his class for a GPA boost.

Mark is a pretty tough marker, especially for a first year class. He also gave very little time to discuss themes of the novels with classmates, so I found it hard to fully form my own opinions and ideas to use in assignments. He was, however, very open to providing extra help and I found myself really improving my writing in this course
Was very good at giving feedback, showed a lot of passion for the subject matter and for teaching. Wanted his class to succeed. Made lectures enjoyable and well paced.

I took WL104W with Michael Davis, but my TM was Andrew. He's probably one of the best TM's I've ever had, because he's so understanding and despite being located all the way in England, you know he cares about his students. I legit BS'd two essays the night before- one short essay and a term paper and got A- and B+.

She is an excellent prof! Very passionate about what she teaches! Tries to make lectures interesting despite the material being a bit dry! If you pay attention, take good notes, and work hard on the take home essays - you'll do great! I loved her!
